```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(MATSS)
library(drake)
```

```{r plot LDA, echo = F}
lda_results <- readd(lda_results)

for (i in seq(lda_results))
{
    if (names(lda_results)[i] == "lda_portal_data")
    {
        plot_lda(lda_results[[i]][[1]], 
                        drake::readd(portal_data_raw)$censusdate)
    } else {
        plot_lda(lda_results[[i]][[1]])
    }
    
}
```
